purpose: Enable users to run AI agents within their web browsers, facilitating easy access and interaction.
principle: Built on web technologies to allow AI agents to execute within browser environments, leveraging WebAssembly for performance.
reusability: Designed to be easily integrated into web applications with support for browser-based execution.
limitations: Limited by browser capabilities and performance compared to server-side execution.
